events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The case has been labeled as a Refund request based on the customer's message indicating dissatisfaction and asking for money back.
Assigning this refund request case to the refund specialist team for further handling and response.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund, and I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting the refund to help processing your request quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product was not as described, and I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process. You will receive an email with the return instructions shortly.
Thanks for your prompt response. I appreciate the quick start of the refund process and will follow the return steps.
Your refund request has been successfully processed, and the return label has been sent to your email. Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have returned the product and received the refund. Please let us know if everything was satisfactory.
Yes, I returned the product yesterday and the refund appeared in my account today. Thanks for your help!
We are glad to hear that your refund was successful. Closing this case now, and thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about our support service. Your input is highly appreciated.
